column3: left this world to be with the lord on june 20
column4: 2015. she was preceded in death by her parents
column5: james and maxine duncan. she is survived by her loving husband
column6: jerry murrell of newport and her precious daughter
column9: bill duncan and his wife melanie
column11: cousin (raised as a sister) betty harrington and husband bruce
column12: and several cousins. she also leaves behind extended family bobby and kim clevenger and their children
column14: and dana bible who was a special caregiver. she was also known as nanny kaye to many. kaye was a member of northport baptist church and was a volunteer for many years at newport medical center. special thanks to dr. thomas conway and his staff; smoky mountain home health (especially nurse ashley weeks)
column16: archie norman and family; kris brady and family
column17: many special friends and prayer warriors
column18: madylyn and matisse bible. also thanks to brandi caldwell
column20: and lisa allen for all they did. funeral services will be held 8:00 pm monday
column23: with dr. archie norman and rev. kris brady officiating. burial will be held at 11:00 am tuesday

column27: 2015 at manes funeral home prior to the funeral service. family and friends may sign the guest register online at: www. manesfuneralhome. com. manes funeral home is in charge.
